Sentencas: Heat accumulation significantly affects the long-term stability of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) during operation.
Titulo: Evaluation on the waste heat recovery potential of thermoacoustically-driven cryocoolers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Harvesting the waste heat for additional applications can provide dual benefits.
Titulo: Evaluation on the waste heat recovery potential of thermoacoustically-driven cryocoolers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A novel hybrid system coupling a thermoacoustically-driven cryocooler (TDC) to a SOFC is proposed, aiming to recover the released waste heat for additional cooling production.
Titulo: Evaluation on the waste heat recovery potential of thermoacoustically-driven cryocoolers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Performance indicators assessing the hybrid system are derived by considering a variety of irreversible losses, from which the generic performance properties for such a hybrid system are determined.
Titulo: Evaluation on the waste heat recovery potential of thermoacoustically-driven cryocoolers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In comparison to a standalone SOFC system, the effectiveness and advantage of the combined system are shown.
Titulo: Evaluation on the waste heat recovery potential of thermoacoustically-driven cryocoolers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the maximum power density, the corresponding energetic efficiency and the exergetic efficiency of the proposed hybrid system are improved compared to that of the standalone SOFC system.
Titulo: Evaluation on the waste heat recovery potential of thermoacoustically-driven cryocoolers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Extensive parametric studies indicate that an increase in working temperature, working pressure of the SOFC, engine stage number or cooling temperature in the TDC improve the proposed system performance, while increasing the heat transfer coefficient worsens the performance.
Titulo: Evaluation on the waste heat recovery potential of thermoacoustically-driven cryocoolers for solid oxide fuel cells
